attributes.action: Enforce motorist abuse of cycle ASL/ASZ boxes
attributes.additional_details:
The Police need resources and guidence to tackle the growing problem of motorists pulling into and blocking the cycle boxes at lights (advanced stop lines or zones).

I propose that the DfT work together with the Police Forces around the UK to actually tackle this problem and help make cyclists safer. Drivers need more education on these facilities and why they should not encroach upon them.
